column5: This may help you negotiate a little more fishing time with 'the boss'... or, maybe not.http://www.medicaldaily.com/more-chores-husband-does-more-likely-marriage-will-end-divorce-242815
I didn't get married until a few months shy of my 50th birthday, amazing how many things I'd been doing all my life that I was doing wrong
Not sure where some of you go wrong..... 34 years married and my fishing partner (wife) and I are still having fun!

Not sure where some of you go wrong..... 34 years married and my fishing partner (wife) and I are still having fun!  Same here Wayne, 11 more days and we'll be celebrating our 50th anniversay and every day is still a blast.
Mine spends more on fishing gear than I do.  S.
I just get asked if I'm gonna be home for supper or not.

My wife goes fishing and hunting with me. She can't spend a whole day fishing but neither can my friends....she's good for about 6 hours.  As far as buying gear she couldn't care less. It's usually me that stops myself from buying more.
Not sure where some of you go wrong.....  According to the link, it's doing chores around the house.

while getting a tattoo of a fish on me a few weeks back discussion starts and i mention "i once had a girlfriend tell me to go marry a fish"  artist replies "if you are getting into a relationship with a fisherman, you better just accept what you are walking into"  Truer words....
